Text: Happy New Year to everyone from the staff of ZNT

Note that this will only work on USB loaders that can boot different .DOL files. Step by Step (I use Usb Loader GX):

1.Go to ULGX and load MEtroid Prime Trilogy

2. When promted click Defualt.

3. Make a SAve account.

4. Restart your wii and load ULGX.

5. Instead of clicking Default, click the metroid game you want to play.

6. Enjoy! Note that this will save to the account you made in step 1.

6 Hours to extract this archive???  Are you serious?  I have a quad core proc with 4 gigs of DDR3 ram on my machine and it takes 6 hours to extract it.  Why put the isos on the torrent instead of an archive?  It'll take longer to extract it than it did to download it.  You could also add the archive and the contents of the archive to the torrent so people can choose to download the archive or the content.

OK, yesterday I have a read error at 88% of extraction of this archive and it failed on part 8 after over 5 hours.  I'm redownloading part 8 to see if it was just a download issue.  If not, I'll see if WinRAR can repair it.  When I get it extracted, I'm going to make a proper torrent without the archive and seed it for a few days until enough people have it.  I'll post the link here when I finish it all if I can get it extracted.

OK, it was just a download issue with part 8, but it still took 6 hours to extract.  After days of work downloading and extracting this archive, here's the torrent with the archive extracted.  This will NOT work on Dolphin Emulator.  Even the work arounds yield 20FPS instead of the 60FPS that the stand alone games yield on the same machine.  (FPS = Frames per sec.)

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6694563
